allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
🏛️ Complete transformation to GCC Signal Pro

- Updated all branding from PK Signal Pulse to GCC Signal Pro
- Changed geographic focus from Pakistan to GCC (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman)
- Updated language support from Urdu to Arabic
- Transformed market data: KSE-100 → TASI, PKR → AED, PSX → ADX/DFM
- Updated sitemap URLs for GCC cities (Dubai, Riyadh, Doha)
- Modified all meta tags, SEO content, and schema.org data for GCC targeting
- Updated economic keywords and local SEO for Gulf markets

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
